potions.name: The Polyglot Potion
potions.description: You can speak 3 additional languages, chosen by the DM, for 1d10 days.

potions.name: The Changeling Potion
potions.description: Roll on the polymorph table.

potions.name: The Kangaroo Potion
potions.description: You can jump four times as high for 24 hours, also all fall damage you take is divided by four for the duration.

potions.name: The Wise but Stupid Potion
potions.description: Your WIS increases by 1d4, and INT decreases by 1d4 for 2d12 hours.

potions.name: The Flying Potion
potions.description: Grow feathers for 1d8 hours.

potions.name: The Overwhelming Potence Potion
potions.description: An erection lasting more than 4 hours

potions.name: The Classic Love Potion
potions.description: A Classic love Potion

potions.name: The Powerful Growth Potion
potions.description: A Potion that if poured on the ground will grow an acre of trees overnight. If drank..... Well that's unfortunate.

potions.name: The Hideous Potion
potions.description: Grows a hideous feature that lasts 1d8 hours (like mandibles).

potions.name: The Beautiful Ginger Potion
potions.description: You grow a beautiful ginger beard down to your knees.

potions.name: The Drooling Potion
potions.description: You drool uncontrollably for 1d4 hours.

potions.name: The Glowing Finger Potion
potions.description: The index finger on your dominant hand start to glow shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet for the next 1d8 hours.

potions.name: The Amnesia Potion
potions.description: You forget everything that's happened over the last 2 days.

potions.name: The Kali Potion
potions.description: Two extra arms sprout from your sides and function as normal for 10 minutes. You can use these arms to take a bonus action during combat. After 10 minutes the arms suddenly fall away, lifeless.

potions.name: The Refreshing Potion
potions.description: The potion is a water elemental. Drinking it tastes like the freshest water you've ever drank. As soon as you take part in vigorous activity you spawn a water elemental in the same square as you.

potions.name: The Coke Potion
potions.description: The potion is Coca-Cola. Describe the sugary taste and fizz, but don't use the brand name. See if the player figures it out.

potions.name: The 100% Efficiency Potion
potions.description: The potion is clear, with glitter floating in it. Drinking it gives you minty fresh breath, and you don't need to fart or go to the toilet for 48 hours as your body becomes 100% efficient.

potions.name: The 'Please Dont't Drink Me' Potion
potions.description: The thick yellow potion twists and moves of its own accord. The fluid inside will actively try to avoid being drunk, clinging to the inside of the bottle. It's actually a Tiny Ochre Jelly.

potions.name: The Mood Broadcast Potion
potions.description: The potion is blood-red with fleshy chunks in it, as through a brain has been put through a blender. Drinking it telegraphs the player's mood and thoughts to all characters within 30ft for one hour, as if under the Detect Thoughts spell.

potions.name: The Levitation Potion
potions.description: You hover 4 inches above the ground for 1d6 hours.

potions.name: The 'Please Dont't Pierce Me' Potion
potions.description: You gain a mild fear of arrows.
